Established in 1974, Bonfiglioli Engineering is a global leader in Made in Italy, high precision Quality Control Packaging Solutions (sachets, pouches, bags, bottles, vials, ampoules, metal cans etc) for Pharmaceuticals, Food & Beverages, Aerosol, and Cosmetics, with non-invasive Leak testing inspection being its core competency. Other focus areas are: Container Closure Integrity Testing, Visual Inspection & Headspace Gas Analysis.

Present in 75 countries, with over 5000 installations around the world, and growing steadily over the years, Bonfiglioli offers avant-garde automated & versatile technology & design, highly customized solutions, feasibility studies & reproducible results, thanks to its dedicated investment in R&D, an outstanding engineering work force, an extensive global sales team network and a dedicated after sales customer service team (offering prompt assistance throughout the product life cycle of the equipment).

Bonfiglioli complies with all required industry norms like GMP, FDA, EU Annex 15 etc. and is an ISO 9001 attested company.

Quality, innovation & customization: Bonfiglioli Engineering is leading futuristic quality solutions in the industry.
